summary: former holland forward and assistant coach patrick kluivert has made a winning start in world cup qualifying as coach of curacao . the caribbean island team advanced to the second qualifying round in concacaf for the 2018 tournament late tuesday . curacao drew 2-2 in a second-leg match at montserrat to win 4-3 on aggregate .
